content.detailedDescription: Tubular clouds, lots of aircraft in the area...Took 2 still shots, one is uploaded and blown up here... one video of nine seconds, at 2-3 seconds. a bright light flashes across the right of the screen, and turns right..Priot to that, there is a light moving erratically in the center of the screen.. the last 2 seconds show a light darting from middle center back up again.
content.summary: Top shape then disc.

content.detailedDescription: My 13 year old son attended a sleepover at a friends. the house is situated on the bluffs overlooking the fox river in algonquin, on the east side. at approximately 3 a.M. my son, and another of the boys were up watching movies, but getting ready for sleep when they glanced out the large window in the room in which they were sleeping. that window faces west, over the river. both my son, and the other boy, reported to me the next morning that they had seen a massive, lighted shape slowly floating north over the fox river. it went north, then reappeared slowly returned going south, until it disappeared from their view, a few minutes afterward it was seen heading north again. they could not estimate the height, but it was over the trees. they said it had a bright white light in front, and some smaller white lights toward the year. the shape was blimp but flared in back, like a triangle. they could hear no sound. it blended in to the night sky but near each light you could see a silvery patch. they could tell the size as it blocked out the stars. it did not move quickly, just slowly, almost like a powered blimp would, but they are certain it was not a blimp or balloon, the latter very common around here. my son as an adamant non-believer in any type of phenomenon like this, and said it was the most frightening thing he ever encountered.
content.summary: Large lighted disc/triangle over fox river

content.detailedDescription: Hey my name is justin and i live in oceanside ny .  last night (12-17)at 1030 my friend and i were driving homefrom taco bell and i noticed a very bright light to my south  and it wasn't moving.I waited for us to get a lil closer so i could line it up with a tree and really make sure it wasnt moving, it wasnt. my house is only a few blocks  from there and my freind pulled off the main road. so i asked him if he would get back on the main road. we got stuck at a light for a while and i thought it would be gone. but as soon as we got back on the main road he saw it as well. it was two glowing balls of light. we drove more to the south and saw two huge glowing balls of light to the east between the dump and pete's clam bar. out of no where these two balls became four lights, these lights couldn't have been more than half a mile from us. so we made a left and went east for a block and it was right in front of us. i jumped out of the car to try and video it but as soon as we got there  it was two balls again.Then a dim third light illuminated on the front and it formed a triangle and slowly started to move to the west right towards nyc. i lost sight of it as it went over the horizon line. it made  a weird pulsing sound that sounded like a plane, but a pulsing sounding, almost as if the plane couldn't get the engines started but this object (or objects) was having no problem moving. it definitely wasn't moving as fast as a plane either when it started to move. also we could def see the water behind it when it was just two or 4 orbs but when it started to move you could see i ship or object in the sky. i have a video of it once it was a flying object moving but its a cell phone cam and it sucks, but if you guys want to analyze this tape ill def send it to you but like i said its a really bad quality. again i live right near jfk and know exactly what a plane looks like and there is no way these balls or the thing it became was a plane.
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: 2 glowing orbs turn to 4 than 2 again than a triangle

content.detailedDescription: Im just trying to find out if the report went through to you guys or not w a video    i pressed to send it and than my comp went nuts. so please let me know if you got it or not. if not i will rewrite it
content.summary: Light orbs

content.detailedDescription: Hey my name is justin and i live in oceanside ny .  last night (12-17) my friend and i were driving home from taco bell around 1020 and i noticed a very bright light to my south  and it wasn't moving. i knew it wasn't moving because when we passed nathans i lined the lights up with a tree and it wasn''t moving at all,. i couldn't stop starring at it. then my friend turned on the block to get to my house and i asked him if he would please go back on the main road. he asked me why and i told him because i thought i saw a bright light in the sky.  so we got back onto the main road and as soon as we turned south he saw it as well.At this point i called my girl friend and asked her to go outside because it looked like it was directly to her south. she didn't see any thing. so we began  to  drive more to the south and we both saw two huge glowing balls of light to the east between the dump and pete's clam bar. out of no where these two balls became four orbs, these lights couldn't have been more than half a mile from us. so we made a left and went east for a block and it was right in front of us. i jumped out of the car to try and video it but as soon as we got there  it was two balls again.Then a dim third light illuminated on the front and it formed a triangle and slowly started to move to the west right towards nyc.We lost it as it hit the horizon line. it made a weird pulsing sound that sounded like a plane but not as loud.It sounded like a pulsing almost as if the plane couldn't get the engines started but  this object was having no problem moving. it definitely wasn't moving as fast as a plane either when it started to move.  i have a video of it once it was a flying object moving ,but its a cell phone cam and it sucks, but if you guys want to analyze this tape ill def send it to you but like i said its a really bad quality(i cant figure out how to save the file of this video. so i can email it to u as well if you like). again i live right near jfk and know exactly what a plane looks like and there is no way these balls or the thing it became was a plane.
content.summary: 2 glowing orbs turn to 4 than 2 again than a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone outside with my video camera at night. i saw nothing at the time but later, after viewing my video, i saw and heard something that flashed quickly on my screen. i freeze framed it and what i saw i couldn't explain. these orbs sort of flashed down and then reversed directions. there were two clusters of about six or so, both in semi-circle formations. the orbs glow red, orange and yellow, as you can see on this photo i've posted on myspace 
http://viewmorepics.Myspace.Com/index.Cfm?Fuseaction=viewimage&friendid=255911914&albumid=919638&imageid=12286337

here is a shortened clip that i made by revideo taping that segment. 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=rfjsw569ksa

i would guess them to have only been about 10 feet away from me, so they were rather small in comparison to the ufp's of similar descriptions. i would also like to add that when i moved the photo on the orbs on "my documents" a strange thing also happened. the black around these orbs turned white. i don't understand how that could have happened either.
here's the link. http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=u1mxorj_8iq
content.summary: Two clusters of orbs appeared on video taken outside my home, in close range. they then jump back the opposite direction, making a clicking sound as they do.

content.detailedDescription:
Had taken my indoors cat outside with me for some fresh air and a bit of sunshine. i was on the telephone at the time also, so this sighting did not get my fullest attention sorry to say because this was extraordinary! i'm always looking up and on that day, i happened to see the most unusual and hard to describe object! it was white with a few appendages - at first. i thought it was very strange and told my friend about it and then had to check to see that the cat wasn't escaping over the fence. i was trying to convince who i was speaking to of what i was seeing, and after seeing the cat was ok i looked back up at the object. it had been and was hovering in the same ne position. what i saw next was that the things shape had changed and was changing. i then noticed that two other smaller orbs were either coming out of this thing or were coming from behind it because i had not noticed them before. i focused in on the biggest of the 2 smaller orbs once they came into view. this orb seemed to kind of change energy fields(?) because of its appearance like a forcefield around it, then rotated clockwise 3 times and in an instant darted downward angling to the left at a remarkable speed and then stopped (between but lower below the other two objects) and they all stayed in their relative positions. it was almost as if it knew it had my undivided attention! two more times this happened- the smaller objects darted in different directions/angles. i was excitedly on the phone giving this account to my friend but couldn't convince them of my not having a rational explanation of this event. at that time i decided to get my son from inside the house so he could witness this. i put my head in the door to yell to him then turned around but they were gone! i did some research on this and the closest thing resembling this sighting is the "strange morphing ufo" in mexico that is on youtube with the exception that my object was cloud -white color, and the orbs in my sighting were making some incredible maneuvers. please feel free to contact me if any questions. ps i also saw a fast moving orb near a commercial airliner an hour or two before this. time and date are approx. it was either oct 15 or the 16, 2009 between 14-16:00. thank you 

ps the previous is an exact copy of what i reported to nuforc. 
i have to add that the mexico morphing object would seem like a hoax to me if i had not seen the same type thing !!(although i didn't notice any symbols).  also, i had left out of the report, when i noticed the orb rotating clockwise 3x, that i did glance away thinking it was my eyes and i turned back to it. this is when it shot down i'd say at an / angle and stop on a dime, which made me know it was not my eyes.  

as far as my feelings go, this is not the first time i've experienced ufo's although it is the first for this type!  i was distracted (w/phone and cat) but i still felt in awe, wth etc. and made light of the situation but now i'm scared and curious.  also i add that the cat was on the fence trying to escape.  when i saw him he looked scared, and i was telling my friend i had to put my cat in before he was abducted and tried to make light of the situation and then said "i'm just teasing -just teasing". that's when the realization set in on me... i started to get scared even though it was day that thing was right up there 'looking at me' lol.  i put the cat inside, stayed close to the door, hollered at my son to try to get him , then turned around it was gone!   have been really freaked out lately and i wanna know wth, ya know?!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Morphing ufo with two smaller orbs seen in broad daylight - orbs w/fantastic speed /maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: My daughter seen a flash of light then took out her camera phone and took a pic of it as they were drivin down hy 9 back to our house on hy 6...When she got home she show it to me and thats when we seen the object to the right of the pic....In the middle top is what she seen and took the pic of.She never even noticed the 4 lights to the right of the pic till it was re looked at...If you look to the left just above the hydro lines it looks like a gray craft....And the four lights to the right are visible to..........If you zoom in on the picture you can see what looks like maybe 20 or more crafts flyin all back to the 4 light object.....She took the pic through the window of the truck drivin down the road...You can see some dirt on the window but you can really tell what is dirt and what is crafts......They just kept drivin cuz they were to scared to stop the truck and get out
content.summary: My daughter saw a flash that looked like a explosion then took a fast picture with her cellphone camera didnt notice anything till we downloaded it to the computer

content.detailedDescription:
Carpinteria california,  dec 16th 4am

last night at 4am as i stepped outside to investigate a noise, probably raccoons on the front porch, i looked up into the sky.
 over the mountains about a mile to the north a dark large object with dim lights silhouetting its shape started moving towards me, it must have been a few thousand feet up in the sky. it made absolutely no noise and was very large , maybe 250ft long and 100 ft wide (just a guess). it moved from the mountains traveling south  to just over my head and started to hover, it then rotated and pointed east. like a flash it disappeared at increadible speed, making no noise, into the eastern horizon .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The shape was triangular

content.detailedDescription: I just want to say in the report i just posted that the sighting was on the 17th, last, eveing, not the 16.
content.summary: Flashing blue/green, red, white light.

content.detailedDescription:
Near the constellation of orion. if you looked at the two start that form orion' pointsof his shoulders and drew a line straight down to the horizon you would see a fairly bright star.

last night around 9:15 i went outside to do a chore. looked up and saw a very bright light above the horizon that was flashing a blue, red, then white light at the point of the star i noted above.

at first i thought it was a helicopter and the light seemed close as it was so big but there was no sound.  then i saw what appeared to be a common airplane  fly under it that i could not hear either so i started to think this light was further away than i thought.

it kept flashing, flashing but did not appear to move in relation to the other stars. it was the brightest thing in all sky and it kinda seemed like there was a christmas light show going on with this light. i watched for at least 45 minutes outside. called my husband out and he saw it too. what i considered green he called blue. maybe it was a teal color. the colors were very distinct. flashing flashing, one afer the other. my husband is more of a sky watcher than me and he said he'd never seen anything like it.

eventually it seemed to settle down and was only flashing colors intermittantly and its size and brighness was diminishing. by 10:40 it looked like any other star in the sky.

it never moved away, a did move along with the other stars in the sky, in other words, it was not stationary. it moves as though it was a star progressing through the heavens on its usual night time course.

i did not feel any particular emotion except wonderment and some excitment
as i had seen ships a very long time ago and i was hoping for more of a show but it didn't happen.
content.summary: Flashing green/blue,, red, white light

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash when i noticed a very bright white object that was very high and moving quickly in a southerly direction. after a 40 seconds it went straight up right before the bright southern star. there is a cluster of many stars just before that star. this is where it went up out of sight in about 2 seconds. it was silent, circular and fast. there was serveral jets flying at the same time heading north out of florida like normal and i could see there flashing beacon lights. this object was slightly higher than the jets but, moving faster and as bright as a star. i've been an r/c pilot for 25 years and familiar with many jets and their movements. this was not like them and had no becon. i have not seen it again, but will keep looking. i noticed it because it was like moving  and brighter than a planet. i immediately realized it was not an airplane or blimp and when it stopped and went straight out into space in 2 seconds i was sold. i could hear the near by jets and see their lights. this ufo had no sound, after trail and no becon light. it accelrated way to fast stright up out of sight. it didn't go up then parallel, but stright up out of sight. i didn't bother trying to get my camera, because i new it would be gone. i just watched it. i can provdie a sketch, but don't have time right now.
content.summary: Circular bright object moving silently south, very high but larger than a planet.   when it stopped and started getting smaller and dimmer (was moving straight up) until it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside the back yard and the sun was down and dark outside, i was talking with my daughter on the phone and sitting in a chair that was facing n.N.W. and from the south moving towards the north, north, west the golden star-like object moved at a single, slow speed, there was no sound, no exhaust.  moving north, north, west from my approximation where i was sitting down it seemed as though it was just four houses to the west of me and just above the tree line.  it's direction never changed course, i told my husband to come see without taking my eyes off of it and he said "well, that is weird never seen anything like that before" and as it moved in it's one direction we watched and it went a distance and disappeared into the atmosphere as though a door opened in the air that was not visible and the star like ship went inside and was gone.  this is the fourth star like ufo that i have sighted in one year.  i was not afraid at all, was very peaceful and when i have mentioned it to others they seem to not want to hear about it again.  i am sorry that i have not photo's but my memory serves me well.
content.summary: Golden, shaped like a planet, no flicker

content.detailedDescription: Well i've made several reports about these orange/reddish orbs in the skies here over the past year. today was a little different some some large orbs in the sky except this time it was although they were taking turns coming on, one would come on in the sky then blink out then the other would come on right after it and blink out several times before they just dissapeared completely. was about 15 miles east of abilene texas.
content.summary: Orbs again

content.detailedDescription:
i went to my mobile home park to fixed a stopped up sewer pipe, on one of my trailers.
when i got there.
 i got my sewer snake and went under the trailer to see if i could fixed the stopped up pipe.
 after i came out from under the trailer.
 i was walking to my truck to put my sewer snake in the back of my truck.
then i stopped before i got to my truck. 
  i notice a strange object moving slow .
it was moving less then 5 miles per hour.
 it was about 15 feet off of the ground .
it was about 3 feet long.
 on each end it was blue.
 in the middle it was lit up with a bunch of small lights and it was glowing. 
 i was standing  about thirty feet away from the object.
 i could not  believe what i was seeing. 
then the object flew about fifty feet. 
then it started to fall apart into light particles.
the object started  to fall apart from the front until it  vanish.
it was like fireworks falling without any sound.
             this happened around  8 pm on tuesday 2006
i just thought i would share this sighting 
you can believe me  or not,  its up to you
content.summary: A small cigar shaped object flew across my moble home park

content.detailedDescription:
In 1981 either in the spring or the fall it has been so long. i still remember fairly clear what had happened one night at ftcky.
the 101 airborne.Div..Had a division exercise and about 28,000 participated. we received a radio call from division hq that we are halting the exercise and observe the sky for unusual objects. we have been notified that the object is unidentifiable. we were asked to mark our watches and monitor time loss. after the event we should examine our selves for puncture wounds in the nape of our necks and behind the ear lobes. not long after that about 1 minute a large object appeared in the sky  i could not see it at first. it appeared like all the other other stars.
the radio operator whom i will not reveal his name from long island ny. and the company commander a capt. who was my age 24 years old at the time, whom i will not reveal his name pointed out the object. it grew bigger and bigger and appeared to be approximately 2000 ft. up. one object turned into 4 maybe 5 smaller objects. they were discs and they came from the larger object. now i can't figure out if the larger object was a cylinder or a larger disc because of the angle and postion it was in. the smaller disc as i recall glowed green on one side and orange on the other.  they flew faster than any earth bound vehicle and could stop on a dime, a very sudden stop no coasting. these discs wanted to be seen obviously with bright colors and it appeared that the were flying in a pattern to triangulate the entire div. and then they stopped and spread quickly to various points. one of the silver discs stopped maybe 150 meters away from my company. i immediately asked the company commander, i volunteer to go forward and make contact. i will be peaceful and show no hostility. he said doc i need to get that cleared. he radioed division .Hq and they said proceed with caution make note of any markings and observe for any life forms inside.
the company commander  told me doc you don't have to do this. i said sir i have to do this we have an opportunity to meet someone from another world. i ran forward hoping this object would not leave before i could make contact.  i stood before this disc that appeared to be silver now not showing what  i will term its battle colors green and orange.
i carried a 45 calb. pistol as i was a senior combat medic rank e5.  i was also wearing my battle dress to include the laser tag equipment used in training.
i approached the first time and waved with my hand and held the position waving as the satellite with the man and the woman on it (voyager). i felt maybe some other life forms  had seen us from that satellite.
i could not see any movement and thought maybe it's my gear. i ran back and dropped my gear at the capstan's. feet and told him to keep my 45 pistol i might be gone a long time and  tell my parent i love them if this happens. he said doc  you need to stay here , i don't feel good about this. i said sir if i make contact 
do you want to approach me or do i bring them to you or do you send one of your lieutenants out. he paused as if he did not want to respond. then he said we will cross that bridge when it happens.
i then jogged eagerly back to the silver disc and with 2 canteens in hand, some c rations in my pocket i offered food and drink to this flying disc.
no response. i had no weapons on me. i was nearly defenseless and i recall while running out there the second time i new i was not going to get any help from the 90 or so men who were now in my background a 150 meters away from me.  it was me, against this disc. i also knew they would probably leave the others alone. my job as a combat medic was to protect the men on health issues and protect wounded from the enemy. i was 12 inches away from this disc. it was silver like flexible foil. it was quiet never made a sound and hovered about 5' (ft) from the ground . i stood 5'11 inches   186 pounds in those days. i was literally nose to nose with this disc.  i saw it to be flat on the bottom and contoured to the top with a small dome on top. 
no markings of any kind . i think i remember portals on the dome on top of the ship. i saw no one  i walked 3/4s around this ship.
no contact. i looked onward to my company who seemed very far away at this point.
then i became extremely concerned in my sprit. what use to be courage almost  became fear and a warning, almost as if some one was talking to me.
i was being told to leave quickly that this was not normal and i was in harms way. it was as if my sprit warned me perhaps god warned me, or may be something in the disc warned me. i then walked quickly around and then faced the front position that i started in  at the disc and  waved one more time. no response and then with some fear about me i jogged in a zigzag  pattern back to my company.
i did not want the occupants on board to think i was scared or let them think they had advantage over me. i could feel a presence and i sent a i am not scared presence back.  it was for lesser words animal instinct being used by both parties in my opinion.
  after i got back i said to the captain, i tried but they do not want to communicate and quite frankly i am scared sir. the company commander said to me you are not alone doc look around you. every man around us was praying to god. i knelt with one knee to the ground near the men
facing as bold as i could and prayed  'god make this thing  go away, this disc is not of good nature, protect us. not more than 5 seconds latter this disc moved back as i left it , dipped down moved like a  zig zag and straight out and up to the larger ship it went.
all the other discs left at the same time.  
   
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
            we were debriefed by i believe by an air force capt. who said he was with information / foreign technology. he asked me if i saw any markings chin se or russian. i said no none. he asked me if it made sound, i said none, did i see anybody , no i saw no one.  
he said we saw a bonified  ufo and the discs were not of earthly origin.  he also told us that one of the discs halted an air force  c130 aircraft when it was taking off 2 feet from the ground at ftcky air strip. it drained the aircraft of energy and set it on the ground.  he also  said   
the gov. wanted to reopen project blue book because of the event. he then said he had no more time for us as he had to interview another  company that had an experience that night. i asked what happened and he replied to all of us that is not up for discussion here.  
i asked the air force debrief if we could talk about this. he said we could to anyone for the rest of our lives. he said the us gov. was real interested in this event.
  
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
      now, two weeks latter we were in the field training and one of the sergeants showed me with night vision goggles, 
you could see for miles when the laser tag mechanism was fired. i said that's why they came down. they thought we had laser guns. 
its a good  thing i took off all my equipment. then the sergeant turned to me and said doc i heard a rumor that 3 men in another company were taken off of the ground and sent back striped of gear and clothing. 2 were dead and one got committed to the hospital crazy bin.
he also said i was either crazy or the bravest medic he had ever seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: This event was een by a whole army div. and thousands of people in the nearby area. some of thes beings are not good.

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were on are way back from his friends house it was around 10:00 at night and it was last year 2008 after hurricane ike hit us and my dad was driving down highway 73 and i was in my own little world looking out the window at the night sky. thinking about random stuff and as i was looking out the window i saw something flying slow towards me. in my mind im like what in the world and i was thinking ok no this cant be happening right now. i asked my dad what is that? he said oh its nothing its just a blimp and i told him no its not. it was coming from north of us right when my dad stoped at the stop sign it stoped. my dad and i were frozed and amaze at what we are seeing. while we were looking at it. it was round and flat and it remind me of this ride that i really love called gravitron that had red lights all around it and they were not blinking or anything it didnt even make a sound. while we were still looking at it and in my mind im thinking i dont believe what im seeing there is no way that this thing that im seeing is a ufo no way! as we are still looking at and im thinking those thoughts in my mind it started to tilt towards us and i thought it wanted to land or something. i kinda wanted to go out and look at it but i was to amaze by it. i also didnt think about taking a picture of it i was thinking that it might not have shown in the picture if i did or it might have took off. my dad started to leave and he asked me to look back and see if i could still see it and i told him i could he asked me what is it doing now and i told him it is still tilting. we were the only ones out there and we were not post to be out there at that time it was past curfew of the hurricane. when we were on are way back we saw a cop and he didnt do nothing just shine is flash light at us. for about three nights my dad would wait outside to see if he would see it again. i thought my dad was crazy for doing that and i didnt want to tell anyone because i knew people wouldnt believe me. the only person i told was my best friend ashley she said thats what i get for not believeing in ufo's and the other person i told was my teacher. she probably thought i was crazy.
content.summary: Metalic disk shape red glowing lights around it

content.detailedDescription:
My wife jodi saw 3 consecutive lights vertical in the sky. the lights were low engough in the sky to not be a celestrial body.

i came outside and then saw these three(3) lights which ran vertical to the treeline behind our home. this treeline in the middle of a cornfield and before it is our orchard. this is a rural area where there are no street lights and not many homes.

after looking at this body of lights with the binoculars i realized at each end of this body was one additional light. 

these lights moved ever so slightly with out a sound. we didn't notice the movement until we left to warm up inside and came back outside to find the lights were not quite in the same position.
content.summary: 3 consecutive lights vertical with one light at each end

content.detailedDescription: First what happened is i woke up because i heard a boom from outside. i was scared out of sleep. i sit up, and i see a white figure in my neighbor's yard. i figure it must be a light, and i try to fall asleep again. it does't work. i think about what it could be, and i sumrised an extra terrestrial. for 30 minutes i was scared like hell to even get up, so i checked my cell phone which was on the table next to me to check the time. it was exactly 6:02. the event has gone from about 5:30 to now, for i currently see the objects while writing the report. i sit up, and i see the figures closer now, so i can make out what they are. bodies. paper white bodies in the distance. i stare at the figures longer. i see the figures blink their "heads" on and off, with no particular pattern, as if speaking to one another. then i see a third one come in. the order of the objects in the window is this fom me: orange figure far left, short figure middle, a slightly bigger figure to the far right. this orange figure is about twice the size of the other two, and is orange. i heard a great roam from the sky, like the cry of a low wailing engine. i figure it could be their vessel's engine, but i cannot see any crafts. i get up a little bit later to look out the window. i saw them oh so clearly. i saw bodies, two arms, two legs, heads, and on one of them i saw a seperate light coming from the one on the far right. it is square. it seems like a map. they blink their "heads" once again as if in conversation, and i turn on my computer to write this report. i am but 15, so i am scared shitless, shaking more than i ever have in my entire life, pardon my french. i talk to my friend and she says she wishes to see the figures as well, while i do have a webcam, it is too late. i look out one last time, and they vanish. i heard another engine sound, loud and clear, and then nothing. only the wind remains now.
content.summary: Extra terrestrials in my neighbor's yard

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, i'll make this brief because i dont know if you'll contact me. i had experiences since i was about 4 or 5. it got to the  point where i was paralyzed in my bed at about age 7. at 9 or 10 i actually saw a ufo from my bedroon window. my experiences were abductions for about 3 years. at least i really , really think they were and lately i've ordered a book from amazon referring to the men in black and my address was somehow changed so i never received the book.I believe in what you are doing and i just need to know you'll respond to me before i elaboorate,
thank you,
kenneth
content.summary: Seemingly square object,  then lit up with two red lights

content.detailedDescription:
I remember listening to the art bell coast to coast show off the radio.  there were reports of a ufo traveling from southern california to the pacific northwest a week or two ago.  so i did my share to looking up because if you keep looking, you will see something.

outside of my patio i shared with my friends, i was the only one standing outside in the dark i first noticed the ufo as a flashlight darting across the night sky.  i didn't know what i just saw at the time.  i thought it some f-18 or f-14 'cuz due west is san diego and pacific navy fleet or maybe aurora.  right in front at the high school(my apartments were right next to it) it appeared.  but i did remember the flash(ufo) folded something before me.  as if space/time folded!  it was a ufo!

gigantic triangle with two lights in front above one other.  one white light and the other light green(i think). it was very quiet!  no sound, no one else but me outside too!  i wanted to tell my friends right away but i didn't want to miss out on what was happening here. 

slowly, it drifted due east from the el cajon h.S. and over the other rows of apartments (headed to ufo college, i wondered).  drifting w/o no sound or cars or people but me, i estimated length to be no less 100 feet long and maybe 40 feet from wing to wing at the ufos' greatest radius.  

when the ufo started over the street, continuing to drift due east, i saw three exhaust ports in the rear.  no emanations of exhaust coming out.  so, the ports weren't being used.  the bigger exhaust port in the middle.  just as soon as i saw this ufo, it was gone in what i believe to be 30 seconds.  the distance i was to this thing was maybe only a parking lot away.  i was on the second row of apartments from it between us a long parking lot.
content.summary: Just happening to stop looking for ufos in the 'hood and off the radio!

content.detailedDescription:
Learn about the true nature of n.A.S.A. nasa had discovered that the earths moon was inhabited when they viewed the first images sent back from ranger 7 in 1964. ranger 7 sent back over 4000 images showing life on the moon. nasa is a branch of the united states military air force. going to the moon in 1969 was not to land on the moon. it was for military observation, documentation and study of the highly advanced intelligents that resides on the moon. the apollo program designed to pacify public interest in the moon and the solar system. this presentation breaks the debunkers back. the information in these videos shows undeniable proof that n.A.S.A and the united states military as well as some other countries have knowledge that the moon is inhabited. this is why they have never been back. this video will also provide reasonable understanding that the recent lunar crater observation and sensing satellite (lcross) was another hoax only to cover the endless lies that nasa has been feeding the public. the lunar crater observation and sensing satellite (lcross) life footage had defects in the footage because they believe all people are naive and so dumb that believing that 
nasa is making progress after 40 plus years in exploration of the moon again. see the truth in these 3-4 presentations then i dare anyone who don't want to believe what is being told here to download the original and do the research. if you dont want to do the school work, why go to school. many will not want to accept what they see with their own eyes, only because they believe the lie and are in denial. the evidence is undeniable.
content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Nasa deception the truth about earths moon they never intended to land in 1969

content.detailedDescription: We we're on our way home..Heading north of downtown tulsa.  my husband and i both saw at the sametime, a very large "shooting star" except that it was very very close.  i thought it looked like it may have landed in our neighborhood.  we couldn't see where it landed. it was very big.  it was a quick moment of ...Wow, what was that?
content.summary: Look like a large fireball going very fast, it looked like it would've crashed and hit land, but no way to know.  it was close and big!

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were driving north into madill on hwy 70.  we both saw a white/orange light flash across the sky to the ne.  the object was falling toward the ground and had a tail that matched the color of the object.  the tail was short.  my wife and i both thoughtthe object looked like a plane falling from the sky.  i felt it also matched video of the debris falling from the shuttle wreckage.  the object did not appear to fall all the way to the ground.  the light faded before it would have gone behind the trees and buildings in our line of sight.
content.summary: Wife and i witnessed a white/orange object apparently falling from sky.  object resembled meteor but tail was short.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home from class at about 10:30 pm.  i was drving east on hwy 70 west of madill.  approximately halfway between ardmore and madill i noticed a white and red ball of light north of the hwy. the object was 75% white from bottom to top.  the top of the object was a red light. i could see not no physical structure, only light.  the object was traveling east.  i watched the light for approx. 30 seconds before the light dimmed to black.  the ligh did not flash out but appeared to collapse into its center.  it was not my impression that the lights were that of a conventional plane or helicopter.  as i continued driving i looked for the object.  about 5 minutes later the light appeared again.  it lit slowly and appeared to still be traveling east.  its position was about the same as it was to my car when i first saw the light.  this time the light was on for only a few seconds and again collapsed into its center.  it came back on only seconds later and remained lit for about a minute.  the light again "collapsed" and did not return for about 10 minutes.  at this time i was beginning to enter madill city limits when the object again lit.  this time the object was well east of my position and seemed to be hovering. as i entered madill i lost sight of the light and did not see it again.  when i arrived home i asked my wife to join me to return to where i had last seen the light.  when we returned the light was gone and low clouds had rolled in.
content.summary: White(top) and red(bottom) star like object. object traveled east and would light, not blink or flash, and would go dark.

content.detailedDescription: as i was leaving out the front door of work, i saw 3 brights lights of equal distance in a row heading south west. it was a very clear night in south west missouri, so observing many commercial flights at the same time made it easy to see in my mind a clear differance. these lights did blink but only one flash at a time. all three had there own flash and all kept the same pace when it came to their intervals. the distance to each other stayed the same while observing 2 to 3 minutes untill they move past the horizon. there were at least 4 jets passing at the time and their blinking lights had that double red/white flash that i always see. i first i thought maybe helecopters becuase my first impression was that they were much closer to the ground than the jets. but i heard no sound and they were moving much more rapidly than i would expect. a co-worker observed this event also.
content.summary: Set of  3 lights of equal distance in a row heading south west.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work around 6:15pm and just before i got to my street, i saw what i at first thought were airplanes, flying in a row.  as i continued to look, i realized they were pretty close together to be airplanes.  then i slowed down and realized all 3 lights were moving together.  i pulled over so to get a better look and to eliminate my moving as a factor.  i rolled down my window and was surprised to see that the 3 blinking lights were definitely moving together and realized that if they were on one object, it would be a huge object.  the lights seemed to blink in a series (1,2,3) it was also smoothly moving with no sound.  i watched it for about 3 minutes, then drove quickly down and yelled to my husband to get in the car.  we then drove back up to where it had been and i could still see it, but it was moving to the west.  we followed it for about 10 minutes out on the county road and he agreed, it was huge and unlike anything he had ever seen.  he was in the military and has a good background for identifying aircraft.  also, when i saw it originally the 3 lights were in a horizontal row, but a few minutes later when my husband was with me, the 3 lights were still in a row but more at a 45 degree angle to the ground as if turning.  there was also no vapor trail or heat signature, and it was a very cold evening.  i believe this is the same oject that was reported by a couple in o'fallon, mo last night at 6pm.
content.summary: Huge object with 3 blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: Upon traveling east on hwy 89 in southern utah, i noticed what looked like a "shooting star" traveling from north to south, what made it stand out to me was that it traveled the entire distance of the sky or horizon. a few moments later another object or "sphere" the same as the first came out of the northern sky traveling south, but this object stopped in the southern sky and a few moments later two more objects traveling together stayed on the same path as the first. the object that was "stopped" now started to travel back north, then a very large and i hate to say it but "cigar" shaped object appeared in the north and was also traveling south. the second object that was now traveling north joined up with the large one for a moment and then it took off like a shot back on the southern path like the others. the large object stayed on it's same course. the large "cigar" or "cyliner" put off a "glow" more than a distinct light or group of lights. a semi truck that was traveling in front of me stopped in the middle of the road and the driver got out and came running back to ask if i had just seen the objects in the sky? he was quite excited as was i. it was quite a sight to see to say the least. i have asked around in the area to see if anybody else had seen the "lights" or "objects" but no other reports have come up yet. i hope to find some other people that may have seen the objects. maybe they saw them from a different angle and have a better discription of what they may have been. the speed of these objects was amazing...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A group of lights / objects in the night sky over southern utah.

content.detailedDescription:
Im a storm chaser in panama city beach, florida. on 8/11/2000 offshore lightning was seen so i desided to go down to the beach and film the lightning. while filming the offshore thunderstorms i noticed two objects to the east of me. the city lights would light them up just enough for me to notice them. i zoomed in with the camcorder and was amazed to see two black triangles with no lights. one doing impossible moves, such as, full circles, shooting back and forth up and down, moving at slow speed then darting fast and stop in mid flight and one that stayed stationary. moving one did two circles besides the stationary craft then overlapped the object completing the circle now hovering level with the stationary one. then it moves from right to left slowy and rubs the bottom of the second craft and slowly moves down and away until lightning lights them up. the moves were incrediable! hovering stationary and gracefully moving up down, left, right, doing circles without having to turn around! it was like there was no front cause it moved in all directions. the whole time one object would remain stationary not moving at all but the second one  did all the crazy stuff. throughout the time the moving craft always returned to the stationary craft. they did this for about 15mins and i lost sight of them in the darkness. nothing, no plane, kites, birds, remote control air craft can stop in mid flight, back up and hover then dart away. nothing. 

video is at http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=58m8uad7j5k
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Two black triangles over the gulf of mexico
